CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 13 Figure 2 showed the UV - visible spectra of PQCDTB and PCZDTB.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PQCDTB |
| PCZDTB |

In the given paragraph, the "Material Name" entities are "PQCDTB" and "PCZDTB". These are the materials whose UV-visible spectra were shown in Figure 2.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PQCDTB |
| PCZDTB |

In the given paragraph, the "Material Name" entities are "PQCDTB" and "PCZDTB". These are the only two entities mentioned in the paragraph, and they are clearly materials. Therefore, there are no entities to remove.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 13 Figure 2 showed the UV - visible spectra of PQCDTB and PCZDTB.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| UV - visible spectra |

The "Property Name" entities in the paragraph are "UV - visible spectra". These entities are mentioned as a single phrase, and they refer to a type of electromagnetic radiation and the techniques used to measure it.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| UV - visible spectra |

The only clear "Material Property" entity in the paragraph is "UV - visible spectra". This entity refers to a property of materials that describes how they interact with ultraviolet and visible light. The other entities mentioned in the paragraph, such as "Figure 2" and "PQCDTB" and "PCZDTB", do not clearly refer to material properties.
